attributes.review: i downloaded the app and as soon as i opened it, the whole app just crashed!! i’m so devastated, i just wanted to know the news and what not however, now a bunch of ice age babies are covering the whole screen! it’s DISGUSTING. i'm utterly disappointed. horrible news outlet and app.
attributes.title: absolutely horrible 🤡✨

attributes.review:
i was just trying to support our wonderful orange 🍊president  but downloading his app. but when i tried to open it gave my phone 📱 a lot of viruses 🦠 i was so scared 😱 that my phone 📱 was going to break i thought 💭 this app was going to be amazing 😉 because off all the good 👍 things said on tiktok i’m very disappointed 😔 that this app cost me a lot of money to fix my phone 📲

this app destroyed my phone after i waited DAYS for it to download. after use my fingers smelled like cheese and i began to hallucinate. a strange orange man broke into my house and strangled my goldfish in front of me, screaming nonsense. overall, design 0/10, concept 0/10, and results 0/10, i need to get a new phone. 

do NOT download
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: when i opened the app it immediately started hacking into my phone and looking through my information, not only that but it started calling me the n word with the HARD er. I was extremely enraged but when I went to delete it it started attacking me. Trump 2020 on a gravestone

K is the worst I have ever seen it glitching as soon as I got it onto my phone and it crashed multiple times in the first two seconds that’s just how bad it is furthermore it gave my phone a virus the orange man virus which isn’t compatible with my phone so I don’t recommend it at all

Like a waste of four years with of time.  Slow as hell- and once it loaded it never worked the way it was supposed to.  It kept crashing and interfering with my other apps. Please for the love of anything you hold dear do not download this app!!
attributes.title: Waste of time

attributes.review: This app took two hours to download and it was a waste of time and the fact that there is an official app for some one so racist upset me and my family to be honest why is this even a thing get this off the App Store plz and my house flooded with slugs when I opened the app

attributes.review: this app is the worst app you could ever get possible, this app keeps glitching and my phones Turing off and on out of no where while I’m on the app. I do recommend just getting ride of this horrid thing. I almost considered resetting my whole phone, it’s so bad.

attributes.review: This app was awful! I downloaded it hoping i would learn more things about Donald Trump and the app told me i would die by midnight!! It also made me pay money to just sign up!! I am now a democrat and will vote Blue for the upcoming elections just because of this app. Very frustrated with how it turned out.
attributes.title: AWFUL APP
